text: Stephen F. Sisolak (born December 26, 1953) is an American businessman and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was the 30th Governor of Nevada from 2019 to 2023. Before becoming Governor, he was a member of the Clark County Commission and was its Chair. Sisolak was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Nevada in the 2018 election and faced Republican Adam Laxalt. In the general election, Sisolak defeated Laxalt by nearly 5%. Sisolak lost his re-election campaign to Republican sheriff Joe Lombardo in November 2022. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nevada Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Politicians from Nevada Category:Businesspeople from Nevada Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Sisolak
